item.title: Database upgrades and maintenance
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Scheduled Maintenance

Summary: Scheduled maintenance is in progress to upgrade core databases, resulting in temporary disablement of Backoffice and API access. POS will continue to work offline, with the expectation of minimal impact on operations.

Feb 28, 03:00 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 28, 02:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 26, 10:59 UTC
Scheduled - On 28th Feb at 2:00am UTC time, we will be upgrading our core databases. This is really important to get this done to allow quicker updates in the future. The Backoffice and API access will be disabled during this time to allow a smoother transition. The POS will continue to work offline and any sales etc will be synced when the connection is restored.

We expect the total maintenance to be under 1 hour but will advise accordingly in case of any issues.

We appreciate your patience and apologise for any inconvenience this might cause.

item.title: Platform Update
item.content:encoded:
Feb 24, 02:55 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 24, 02:35 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 23, 18:54 UTC
Scheduled - On 24th Feb at 2:35am UTC time, we will begin a platform update.
The downtime should be around 20 minutes or less.
We apologise for any inconvenience.

item.title: Intermittent service unavailability
item.content:encoded:
May 21, 14:09 UTC
Resolved - We have seen no further incidents since our earlier platform change at 14:15.

May 21, 12:59 UTC
Monitoring - We have made a configuration change to the load balancer in our infrastructure. We have seen no further issues over the past 15 minutes since introducing this change. We continue to monitor.

May 21, 12:22 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

May 21, 12:22 UTC
Update - We are investigating reports of intermittent errors for a small number of Goodeats customers. Our early analysis shows this is impacting less than 0.1% of requests. We will provide more details once we identify the root cause.

May 21, 11:51 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: Card payment unavailable
item.content:encoded:
Mar 19, 13:49 UTC
Resolved - Card payments utilizing manual or saved card entry for Stripe payments were failing. Apple/Google pay payments were unaffected.

item.title: Facebook login unavailable
item.content:encoded:
Feb 2, 15:32 UTC
Resolved - Facebook login is now functional again.

Feb 2, 11:02 UTC
Identified - Facebook login is currently unavailable. Google and username/password login is still operational.
